actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the appointment of additional district judges.

summary.text: Provides for the appointment of additional district judges in the States of Alabama, California, Florida, Georgia, Indiana, Kansas, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Minnesota, Missouri, New Jersey, New York, Oklahoma, Oregon, Tennessee, Texas, Virginia, Washington, and Wisconsin. He makes the existing district judgeship for the eastern district of North Carolina a permanent judgeship. (Amends 28 U.S.C. 133)

titles.title: A bill to provide for the appointment of additional district judges.
